**2022-05-18 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons**

**Accepted**

- **doc: update Go memory model** [#50859](https://golang.org/issue/50859)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **fmt: add FormatString(State) string** [#51668](https://golang.org/issue/51668)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/go: Declare module content in \`go.files\` config** [#52807](https://golang.org/issue/52807)
  - duplicate of #42965
- **runtime/debug: add GCStats field to track count of marked pointers during last GC** [#52692](https://golang.org/issue/52692)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **time: add time.AddMonth to add  a month without normalization** [#52775](https://golang.org/issue/52775)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **cmd/go: support for Git LFS via new VCS qualifier** [#47308](https://golang.org/issue/47308)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **crypto/ed25519: Implement Ed25519ph** [#31804](https://golang.org/issue/31804)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **go/ast: formally deprecate Object** [#52463](https://golang.org/issue/52463)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/exp/maps: Copy should use two generic map types** [#52593](https://golang.org/issue/52593)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **crypto: support bn, nums, sm2 curves** [#52778](https://golang.org/issue/52778)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **testing: add Unsetenv to call os.Unsetenv and then restore the value using Cleanup** [#52817](https://golang.org/issue/52817)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Active**

- **cmd/go: \`go list -e -m -json all\` to start displaying hashes of modules** [#52792](https://golang.org/issue/52792)
  - discussion ongoing
- **cmd/go: partial vendoring** [#52604](https://golang.org/issue/52604)
  - discussion ongoing
- **context: add APIs for writing and reading cancelation cause** [#51365](https://golang.org/issue/51365)
  - commented
- **crypto/ecdh: new package** [#52221](https://golang.org/issue/52221)
  - commented
- **database/sql: add SetMaxBadConnRetries** [#52886](https://golang.org/issue/52886)
  - added to minutes
- **do something smart with virtual machine forks & crypto** [#52544](https://golang.org/issue/52544)
  - commented
- **encoding/json: dynamic field omission** [#52803](https://golang.org/issue/52803)
  - discussion ongoing
- **errors: add With(err, other error) error** [#52607](https://golang.org/issue/52607)
  - discussion ongoing
- **fmt: add flags to control printing of slices** [#52936](https://golang.org/issue/52936)
  - added to minutes
  - commented
- **net/http: add ServeFSFile** [#51971](https://golang.org/issue/51971)
  - discussion ongoing
- **net/http: context based graceful server shutdown** [#52805](https://golang.org/issue/52805)
  - commented
- **os/exec: add fields for managing termination signals and pipes** [#50436](https://golang.org/issue/50436)
  - commented
- **spec: allow explicit conversion from function to 1-method interface** [#47487](https://golang.org/issue/47487)
  - commented
- **testing: add Name to track file and line of test case declaration** [#52751](https://golang.org/issue/52751)
  - discussion ongoing
- **x/crypto/ssh: add  ServerConfig.HostKeyAlgorithms** [#52132](https://golang.org/issue/52132)
  - discussion ongoing
- **x/exp/maps: add Merge** [#52806](https://golang.org/issue/52806)
  - commented
- **x/net: Accept client-provided logger for http2 debug logs in addition to GODEBUG=http2debug=1,2** [#52734](https://golang.org/issue/52734)
  - added to minutes
- **x/sys/unix: add RecvmsgBufs ad SendmsgBufs** [#52885](https://golang.org/issue/52885)
  - added to minutes

**Hold**

- **go/build: add API to pick out cgo flags** [#52222](https://golang.org/issue/52222)
  - hold for updated API proposal
- **go/build: add API to return embed patterns** [#52245](https://golang.org/issue/52245)
  - hold for updated API proposal
- **go/importer: provide a registry for x/tools importers to plug into** [#52163](https://golang.org/issue/52163)
  - hold for concrete API proposal
- **reflect: reflect.ValueOf(nil).IsNil() panics; let's make it return true** [#51649](https://golang.org/issue/51649)
  - hold for prototype
